full_summary:
====================================================

# Tender Announcement

## F5561-230116: CCGS Sambro Drydocking Refit

### Reference and Solicitation Number

* Reference Number: WS4042660800
* Solicitation Number: WS4042660800-Doc4042777433

### Tender Details

* Publication Date: June 8, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 26, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* Amendment Date: June 21, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 30, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: (None specified)

### Scope of Work

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites bidders to submit proposals for the Drydocking Refit of the CCGS Sambro. The scope of work includes:

* Marine transport
* Marine craft systems and subassemblies
* Vessel docking services
* Transportation repair or maintenance services

### Procurement Method and Criteria

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements and Regions

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions: Nova Scotia and Canada

### Contracting Entity and End-User

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### Contact Information

* Contractual Agent: Quentin Crocker, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Note: No telephone or fax numbers provided.

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: June 26, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* Expected contract start date: June 30, 2023

### Specifications

Please consult the [Procurement Details](#procurementdetails) page for more information.

Note: No links are provided as there are no attachment or notice URLs provided in the text.
